item.title: 'US ready, willing to mediate': Trump on India-China border standoff
item.description: President Donald Trump on Wednesday took to Twitter and said, "We have informed both India and China that the United States is ready, willing and able to mediate or arbitrate their now raging border dispute. Thank you!" The situation in eastern Ladakh deteriorated after around 250 Chinese and Indian soldiers were engaged in a violent face-off on May 5.
